name: places/ChIJ__9PlqZYwokRRgGp1L50V6c
formattedAddress: 899 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 899 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text:
Paul Knoepflmacher is truly one of a kind. When I found out that he had done a stint in the Peace Corp I knew he was the one for me. His compassion is extraordinary, as is his patience. He is easy to talk to. I recently had an annual check-up and was concerned that I needed to be aware of his time. I told him that I would “hurry” with my questions. He immediately said “Please don’t.  I’ve blocked off an hour and a half for us.”  Who does that any more?

Not only is he an excellent Internal Medicine physician, he is just plain wonderful. It’s like finding out your doctor is also your dear friend.

He is easy to talk to. I recently had an annual check-up and was concerned that I needed to be aware of his time. I told him that I would “hurry” with my questions. Not only is he an excellent Internal Medicine physician, he is just plain wonderful. It’s like finding out your doctor is also your dear friend.

originalText.text: I have been with Dr K for many years. He has always shown great professional approach as a doctor. He always takes the time necessary to explain his diagnosis of medical issues and often suggests practical ways of dealing with them. I have been very satisfied with the medical services he has provided to me over the years.

originalText.text: Dr K is an excellent doctor! He always answers swiftly and competently when we have an issue.

text.text: Dr K is an excellent doctor! He always answers swiftly and competently when we have an issue.

originalText.text:
My wife and I have been his patient for years.  He embodies all the best qualities of an internist (and since I am 89 years old, I guess can include gerontology.).  He listens carefully and responds with helful suggestions.  He is quick to answer calls or emails with good suggestions and will always folow through to solve or allievite my medical problems.  I have never felt rushed and always walked out of his office feeling better physically and emotionally.

originalText.text: As always, I am very satisfied and content with the way Dr. Knoepflmacher always responded to all my questions and concerns.   He is very professional, honest, thorough and a very kind person.  I strongly recommend Dr. Knoepflmacher.
